Package com.payd.shooti.graphics.lighting

Class SimpleLightGroup

java.lang.Object
com.payd.shooti.graphics.lighting.SimpleLightGroup
All Implemented Interfaces:
ISimpleLight, IDispose, IUpdate
Direct Known Subclasses:
FlashlightLight
public class SimpleLightGroup extends Object implements ISimpleLight
Holds a collection of SimpleLights and acts as a single SimpleLight container.
See Also:
  • SimpleLight
  • SimplePointLight
  • SimpleConeLight
  • ISimpleLight
